Reviews.Content: staff nice 43 top floor clean nice bathroom bit cant complain noise especially morning breakfast time kept sleeping annoying shouldnt sleeping holiday wifi expensive 50 time reception issue fine im guessing router ground floor upper levels dont coverage location hotel amazing street literally 3 minute walk bustling central square couldnt

Reviews.Title: “Does its job well”

Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights impressed staff helpful ground floor suited suitcase nice quaint tv loads diffrent channels bathroom clean hotel corner vondel park public transport close tram tourist bus little disappointed breakfast cold meats boiled eggs fruit tomatos staff 2 morning 1 pain butt avoided coming 1 rude cat lives hotel doesnt youll morning breakfast hes friendly little fellow scratch name spencer

Reviews.Title: “Good location and friendly helpful and knowledgable staff”

Reviews.Content: arrived friendly welcome staff knowledgable helpful hotel warm location minutes walk leidseplein numerous bars restaurants particularly enjoyed pantry walking distance lot attractions hotel appears traditional dutch building emailed request floor confirmed arrival allocated ground floor appeared extension compact size perfectly acceptable price paid unfortunately soundproofing time door closed stairs noise travelled unfortunately am light sleeper husband slept ok sound sleeper wont bother youthe bed comfortable shower plenty hot water continental breakfast perfectly adequately enjoyable weekend ice racing fifteen

Reviews.Title: “Friendly warm hotel in a good location”

Reviews.Content: hotel quiet location walking distance leidesplein bus tram stops various bars cafes restaurants staff friendly helpful building kept lovely warm 10 beds comfortable choice breakfast plenty eat size bathshower plenty hot water star value price paid

Reviews.Title: “Halpful and friendly staff, room OK...”

Reviews.Content: hotel friendly hotel stones throw fantastic vondel park leidseplein dozens bars eateries double little clean bathroomshower staff friendly keen help advice directions breakfast buffet plenty choice overall id recommend reasonably inexpensive stay amsterdam
